description: From Middle English blisfully, blisfulliche, blisvolliche, equivalent to blissful +â€Ž -ly.

adverbs.description: blissfully (comparative more blissfully, superlative most blissfully)

entries.meaning: In a blissful, happy or joyful manner.
examples: What changes will be wrought in the character and condition of mankind, as the millennium advances and rolls blissfully away.
